input_text:
Job Title: DC Material Handler

Location: Old Fort, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
A collective energy and ambition. A place where you can make a real difference.We're a company that genuinely cares about our people, our products, our consumers and the environment.Our unique, informal culture champions courage, determination and collaboration. Knowing we have an open and supportive team means each of us has the freedom to take responsibility and ownership. We have a shared passion to work hard, innovate and push boundaries.United by the belief that when we strive for growth, anything is possible. While we might not be the largest company in our industry, we believe we can have the biggest impact because: Together We Have the Power to Win.To load and unload finished goods, stock transfer orders, and transfers to Church & Dwight customers and outside Distribution Centers, build pick pallets.This is at the Warehouse in Fostoria, OH reporting on Shift 991: Thursday 6:00 pm-02:00 am, Friday & Saturday 6:00 pm-06:00 am, Sunday 6:00 pm-02:00 am . Starting hourly rate is $28.01 plus shift premiums.Essential FunctionsOperates sit down, stand up and pallet riders proficiently. Loads and unloads trailers and containers accurately and to specification.Builds pick pallets to pick list.Maintains necessary paperwork with a high degree of accuracy.Performs daily preventive maintenance inspections.Maintains a clean department by sweeping and dumping trash at the end of each shift.Works with Church & Dwight carriers and customers in a highly professional manner.Must be proficient in WMS to load or unload trucks in a timely manner.Read and understand the pick list by quantity, product type, lot codes, and product version codes to fill the customer's orderOperate stretch wrapper to secure load on palletFamiliar with the plant food safety program and basic HACCP principlesWork any shift during the week as well as weekendsUse safe operating procedures and judgmentOperate forklift in a safe and timely manner.Follow all facility rules to maintain quality and integrity of both raw materials and finished productsLift 50 pounds consistentlyKnowledge, Skills and AbilitiesWork any shift during the week as well as weekendsUse safe operating procedures and judgment and Operate forklift in a safe and timely manner.Follow all facility rules to maintain quality and integrity of both raw materials and finished productsLift 50 pounds consistently Familiar with the plant food safety program and basic HACCP principlesEducation and ExperienceMinimum of a High School Diploma / GED is requiredMinimum of six months of forklift experienceWMS experience is preferredWorking knowledge of material handling equipment#piqChurch & Dwight is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer/Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities.For more information on our company, our brands and our culture visit us at http://www.churchdwight.com/PandoLogic. Keywords: Material Handler, Location: Old Fort, OH - 44861

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: DC Material Handler
output_json.summary: A position at Church & Dwight in Old Fort, OH, requiring management skills and manufacturing experience.
job_responsibilities: Operates sit down, stand up and pallet riders proficiently.
Loads and unloads trailers and containers accurately and to specification.
Builds pick pallets to pick list.
Maintains necessary paperwork with a high degree of accuracy.
Maintains a clean department by sweeping and dumping trash at the end of each shift.
Works with Church & Dwight carriers and customers in a highly professional manner.
Must be proficient in WMS to load or unload trucks in a timely manner.
Read and understand the pick list by quantity, product type, lot codes, and product version codes to fill the customer's order.
Operate stretch wrapper to secure load on pallet.
Familiar with the plant food safety program and basic HACCP principles.
Work any shift during the week as well as weekends.
Use safe operating procedures and judgment.
Operate forklift in a safe and timely manner.
Follow all facility rules to maintain quality and integrity of both raw materials and finished products.
output_json.company_information: Church & Dwight is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer/Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities.
